# Straight Up Finance
> Australia's straight-up finance broker for cars, motorbikes, and boats.

## About
Straight Up Finance is an Australian finance broker offering car, motorbike, and boat loans. We charge the same fees for everyone regardless of credit history. Fast approvals, no BS.

## Services
- Car Finance (new, used, private sale)
- Motorbike Finance (sports, cruisers, dirt bikes)
- Boat Finance (tinnies, runabouts, cruisers)

## Key Features
- Same fee structure for all customers
- No rate markup
- Fast 24-48 hour approvals
- Australia wide service

## Contact
- Website: https://straightup-finance.com.au
- Email: straightupfinanceaus@gmail.com
- Hours: Mon-Fri 8am-6pm AWST
